only hangouts

Dirk Kelly 2014-01-09, Thursday

I am only bringing my work phone to Japan, the iPhone is too terrible.

During this time I have set up my personal Google Hangouts on the device, in unison with my InterExchange account.

That will be the only way to contact me over personal matters.

Dirk.
